component.name: customRowTitle
component.script:
sub Init() m.Poster = m.top.findNode("poster") m.Title = m.top.findNode("title") m.Advertiser = m.top.findNode("adLabel") m.Poster.observeField("loadStatus", "onLoadStatusChanged") end sub
sub onLoadStatusChanged() print m.Poster.uri print m.Poster.loadStatus if m.Poster.loadStatus = "failed" print "load failed for poster" end if end sub
sub onContentChanged() if(m.top.content.logo <> invalid) m.Poster.uri = m.top.content.logo m.Poster.visible = true m.Advertiser.visible = true else m.Poster.visible = false m.Advertiser.visible = false end if m.Title.text = m.top.content.TITLE end sub
